name: smacker
content:
smacker noun
(MOUTH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] informal a loud or long kiss
[ C ] US the lips or the outer part of the mouth: a kiss on the smacker

smacker noun
(MONEY)
[ C usually plural ] slang a pound or a dollar: It cost me 50 smackers to get that window fixed.
